citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 pm on
12-May-17.
Knocked on door and no answer. Called all contact numbers and left messages. Waited for 30 minutes at facility.
Call was returned by licensee at 5:38 pm.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:30 pm on
12-May-17.
Knocked on door and no answer.  Called all contact numbers and left messages.   Waited for 30 minutes at facility. 
Call was returned by licensee at 5:38 pm.
